**Half-Life (Video Game) Summary:**

Half-Life is a popular 1998 computer game where you play as scientist Gordon Freeman. After a bad experiment, aliens take over the research facility, and you must escape. The game is about fighting, exploring, and solving puzzles. It's known for its exciting story and realistic world, different from other games at the time. Half-Life was a big success, winning many awards and selling millions of copies. It started a series of games and inspired lots of fan creations.
